txt.en: You have found a ballista, unmanned but loaded and ready to fire. You guess that these were prepared by Gothmog's forces for use against the merrevail, but Gothmog's men were forced to retreat before this one could be fired. You decide you may as well use them to shoot merrevail and great-bats out of the sky yourself!
Ballistae along the Circle of Madness were abandoned when Gothmog's forces retreated higher into the city.
Loaded ballistae can be found in the Circle of Madness.\n\nYou should fire loaded ballistae at flying merrevail.

You tell Rhadrog of the ballistae and the merrevail you shot down.\n\n'Oh ho! I did not know you were so comfortable with siegecraft, [placeholder]. I wonder if there are any more bolts lying around. I wouldn't mind taking a few shots at them myself!'
Rhadrog is stationed inside Barad Elenath, the Star-gazers' Spire.\n\nYou should talk to Rhadrog.
